name: I WISH
content: Yeah I wish there was a way
I could take away the pain
Yeah I wish there was a way
D**n I wish there was a way
但我做不到我希望我能做到
Yeah I wish there was a way
I could take away the pain
Yeah I wish there was a way
D**n I wish there was a way
但我做不到我希望我能做到
每天晚上我都看到我不可告人的秘密
我以为金钱可以解决问题
And tears drop down they fallin'
But it's like I can't help it
You say you can't help me
I feel like I've been to Hell
我挡了你的路我需要帮助
今天就很需要我希望我能治愈这种痛苦
I wish I could kill this pain
我希望我能治愈这种痛苦
I wish I could kill these days
我希望这些日子我可以尽情放纵
Yeah I wish there was a way
I could take away the pain
Yeah I wish there was a way
D**n I wish there was a way
但我做不到我希望我能做到
Yeah I wish there was a way
I could take away the pain
